Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Alters the definition of a qualified historic home for the purposes of the historic homeownership rehabilitation credit
Summary: Alters the definition of a qualified historic home for the purposes of the historic homeownership rehabilitation credit.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to the definition of qualified historic home for the purposes of the historic homeownership rehabilitation credit
